content: TE-CX SC Scaling chisels (one sided) Self-sharpening SDS Plus (TE-C) scaling chisels for scraping away weld spatter, formwork seepage and other residues (one-sided cutting edge) ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Chisels and rod drivers- - - ### FEATURES:Features Self-sharpening, one-sided cutting edge – work more efficiently and for longer with the same chisel, no resharpening or rehardening necessary Better reliability – these chisel bits are made from high-alloy steel, essential when you need consistency and reliability Upgraded breaking power – extra-tough connection end transfers more force from the tool to the chisel Certified quality – developed using ISO certified processes and more than 30 years of expertise in chisel design and production Multiple widths and lengths available – use shorter bits for best energy transmission and increased longevity, and longer ones for piercing deeper or reaching into tight spaces Applications Removing weld spatter, scale and concrete formwork overflow or seepage Channeling in concrete Channeling with one straight edge For use with SDS Plus (TE-C) electric jackhammers, breakers or rotary hammers ### TECHNICAL DATA: Connection end: TE-C (SDS Plus) Application: Scaling, Channeling Length: 7.1 in Technical Data | Connection end | TE-C (SDS Plus) | Application | Scaling, Channeling | Length | 7.1 in | Width | 1.6 in | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 282304 - Scaling edge chisel TE-CX SCE 18/4 - Package Size 1 pc
